instructions: Open the official Instagram app on your iOS or Android device. Open the Instagram Stories feature by either swiping right or tap the camera icon in the upper-left corner. Take a photo or record a video as usual. Tap the stickers icon. Tap Questions . This is the Instagram questions sticker. Tap Ask me a question and type your question or prompt. Tap the color wheel at the top of the screen to change the color of your question sticker. Tap Done . Move and resize the question sticker as you would any other Instagram Story element. Add other gifs, stickers, or music to your Instagram Story as usual. When you re ready, tap Your Story to publish it to your Instagram Story.
